db:info.db:title: AttributeOperand QML Type
db:info.db:titleabbrev: An OPC UA module for Qt

db:abstract.db:para: This type was introduced in QtOpcUa 5.13.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The AttributeOperand is defined in OPC-UA part 4, 7.4.4.4. It has the same purpose as SimpleAttributeOperand but has more configurable options.

db:section.db:title: alias : string
db:section.db:para: Alias name for the operand. This allows using this instance as operand for other operations in the filter.

db:section.db:title: browsePath : list<OpcUaNodeId>
db:section.db:para: Browse path to the node holding the attribute.

db:section.db:title: indexRange : string
db:section.db:para: Index range string used to identify a single value or subset of the attribute's value.

db:section.db:title: nodeAttribute : Constants.NodeAttribute
db:section.db:para: Attribute of the node browsePath is pointing to. The default value is Constants.NodeAttribute.Value.

db:section.db:title: typeId : string
db:section.db:para: Node id of the type definition node. The operand will be of the type or one of its subtypes.
